title: Stuck after finishing a game.
body:
Just won my last promotion game and got stuck on waiting for stats screen. Skipped waiting for stats to see that I haven't been promoted and no record of the game in my match history. Logged out and in and it said that I have left a game in progress even though we won the game. logged in and out again but still stuck.

Same thing is happening to my duo

Edit: Still stuck after 2+ hours

replies.body:
*Spooky ghost games?*

It's definitely the servers.

> [{quoted}](name=Gambino,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=9cmX837Y,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-05-05T04:38:41.027+0000)
>
> Just won my last promotion game and got stuck on waiting for stats screen. Skipped waiting for stats to see that I haven't been promoted and no record of the game in my match history. Logged out and in and it said that I have left a game in progress even though we won the game. logged in and out again but still stuck.
> 
> Same thing is happening to my duo
> 
> Edit: Still stuck after an hour zzz

Yeh lol same thing is happening to me, right now, as I post this, :C
{{item:3073}} {{item:3073}} Rito plis I beg you, fix now ;c
